nodes.text: Jon Childress Farmer is a visual effects modeler for Star Wars: The Clone Wars, a CGI-based television series that is planned to air in Fall of 2008 as a continuation of the animated Star Wars: Clone Wars series that was shown on Cartoon Network in 2003. Jon Childress Farmer also worked in CGI for Chicken Little (2005), War of the Worlds (2005), Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith (2005), The Matrix Revolutions (2003), Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones (2002), Monsters, Inc. (2001), and Toy Story 2 (1999).
